title: bring your ideas to life
texts: It all begins with your idea. Considering an off-grid capable solar system? Want to add controlled home lighting?
Whatever you’re dreaming about, we can help bring your ideal home into a reality.

title: quality installations
texts: It can be intimidating to think of a significant investment in your home. We will always work with you to design the perfect system.
Regis Electric is here to provide reliable information and quality installations.

title: reliable and trusted
texts: We’ve been installing solar and home automation systems in homes since 2010.
Our reputation as a reliable and trusted contractor is earned from decades on the job.
